npx hardhat run scripts/updatePrices.js --network riseTestnet
console.log("Preço USDT:", (await prediction.getPrice(tokens.USDT))[0].toString());
console.log("Preço USDC:", (await prediction.getPrice(tokens.USDC))[0].toString());
console.log("Preço RISE:", (await prediction.getPrice(tokens.RISE))[0].toString());
const predictionAddress = "0x48eCef05a0439468576A2db561A07173677ab55c";
